item.title: Details on this website
item.description: These pages were setup using Hugo and Congo.

item.title: PhD details
item.description: PhD situation #My PhD takes place between Sherbrooke (Québec, Canada) and Paris.

item.title: Codes
item.description: ISF (MATLAB) #ISF and BDIFFMIN are available at Software Heritage and its functioning described in this pdf.

item.title: Current situation
item.description: I am a PhD student at Université de Sherbrooke, in the BISOUS team (in French), and at Inria Paris, in the SERENA team, supervised by Jean-Pierre Dussault (Sherbrooke) and Jean Charles Gilbert (Paris) since April 2021.

item.title: Presentations
item.description: Posters # Nonsmooth OPTimization and Applications (NOPTA), Antwerpen, Belgium, April 2024, “A Differentiability Problem solved by Discrete Geometry”.
